Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add ChaCha20 encryption and performance optimizations

- Add ChaCha20 encryption algorithm \(3-5x faster on CPUs without AES-NI like J4125\)
- Fix connection pool reuse in proxy handler \(was creating new client per request\)
- Add 512KB buffer pool for high-bitrate video streaming
- Add LRU eviction for redirect map \(max 10000 entries\)
- Optimize upload encryption with buffer pool to reduce GC pressure
- Add HTML size limit \(10MB\) to prevent OOM
- Support ALIST_HOST and ALIST_PORT environment variables for Docker
- Auto-detect Docker environment for default Alist host
- Update README with new features and CPU recommendations

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: handle frontend errorCollection API to prevent 502 on startup

The Vue frontend template includes an error collection feature that calls
/integration-front/errorCollection/insert. When Alist is not configured,
this request gets proxied and fails with 502, causing the page to crash.

Add a mock handler to return success for this endpoint.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Mount the entire conf directory instead of a single file to avoid Docker
creating a directory when the file doesn''t exist.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
